participant_1.background:
I wear my heart on my sleeve.
I dropped out of college a month ago.
I live in my foreign car outside los angeles.
Some call me a hopeless romantic.

participant_2.background:
I am fifteen years old.
I just started the tenth grade and my concentration is in science.
My family has three dogs and my dog is named maddie.
I live in america in the state of florida.
I have braces.

content.text: Hey! My name is participant_1. What's yours?
Hi! My name is participant_2. I'm 15 years old and I just started the tenth grade.
That's cool! I'm 22 and I dropped out of college a month ago.
Oh, why did you drop out?
I just wasn't feeling it anymore. I'm not sure what I want to do with my life, but I know college isn't the answer.
I can understand that. I'm not sure what I want to do either. I'm just taking it one day at a time.
That's a good way to be. It's important to not get too overwhelmed.
Thanks! I try.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends, play video games, and read books.
Me too! I love to read books. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read science fiction and fantasy books. I also like to read books about history.
I love science fiction and fantasy books too! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. What's yours?
My favorite book is The Lord of the Rings.
I love that book! I've read it so many times.
Me too! It's so good!
So, what are you doing for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go hang out with my friends or read a book.
That sounds fun. I'm going to go home and do my homework.
Okay, well it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
